column6:
The War of the Symbiotes rages on - and the next victim may be Spider-Man himself! The high-flying Beetle has sliced off a tentacle of the slavering symbiote called Venom - but what does he want with it? Howling in pain, Venom gives chase to his tormentor through the streets of Manhattan, catching the attention of a certain wall-crawler. And when all three combatants come together, what occurs is so shocking, so unexpected, it could only happen in the book in which anything can happen! ,2008,8
Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | other:Chris Eliopoulos | other:Richard Isanove | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
